summary: A retiring police officer remembers a thrilling case of his life which is not recorded in any case files.
cast: Kamal Haasan|Mohanlal|Lakshmi|Anuja Iyer|Poonam Kaur|Ganesh Venkatraman|Bharath Reddy|Mukhtar Khan|Prem Kumar|Sriman|Santhana Bharathi|M.S. Bhaskar|R.S. Shivaji|Sarath Mandava|Karate Raja|Mahesh|Prem Nizaar|Rohit Khuranna|Bobby|A.S. Ramana|Anand Krishnamoorthi|Kaasi Nadimpalli|Vijaya Kumar|Siva Narayana|Anand Varma|Jonathan Smiles|Andrew Scott Dixon
title: Unnaipol Oruvan
